Action

Source: vignettes/actions.Rmd
actions.Rmd

Toggle chart visibility

g2(cars, asp(speed, dist)) %>% 
  fig_point() %>% 
  action_toggle_visible("toggler")
input_slider("slider", "Slide me", 5, 0, 10)
input_select("selector", "Select me", letters[1:3])
